GUNS N ROSES

GNR Barbed Wire Tray

H5745

Log in for pricing

GNR Rolling Trays

  • Made from aluminum
  • Compact design
  • Non-stick rolling surface
  • Rounded edges
  • High-quality graphic
  • Available in Small and Medium


Our officially licensed Guns N Roses line of smoking accessories is back with an all-new set of rolling trays! As with the other pieces in this seriously cool collection, the new trays feature iconic artwork familiar to superfans or anyone who loves rock music in general. Be sure to keep good times rolling with GNR Rolling Trays!

These trays have been cut from quality aluminum and were made with durability in mind. They come in two sizes, measuring 18 x 14 cm / 7 x 5.5 inches (small) and 27 x 16 cm / 10.6 x 6.2 inches (medium). Their size and durability make them excellent for indoor or outdoor use, while at home or on the go. The trays feature a non-stick rolling surface and rounded edges, making your rolling mix muxheasier to handle.

Small 180x140x15 mm

Medium 270x160x22 mm

Barbed Wire
The dangerously cool Barbed Wire features a GNR jolly roger with the iconic top-hatted skull and crossed revolvers against a backdrop of roses in bloom, with barbed wire in the foreground and spiky-looking guitar strings in the background.

Skunk Brand

Skunk Flavoured Hemp Rolling Papers

GP1076

Log in for pricing

Flavoured Skunk rolling papers offer the same great quality of the original, just with a hint of something sweet. These high-quality hemp papers are made where papers should be made, in the birthplace of rolling papers Alcoy, Spain. Each pack comes individually wrapped so you get the freshest papers possible, with the best flavour around. Nothing is worse than papers that tear when you roll them or run when you smoke them, Skunk keeps their papers thin and add a watermark so they burn slow and even. These tasty papers are not only sweet to smoke, but sweet to our furry friends as well. Skunk uses only natural plant-based glue so theyre vegan friendly. All papers are 1 size and have 32 papers in the pack. There are 24 wrapped packs per box.

Skunkalicious cooling, sweet menthol that has a hint of peppery sweetness
Hawaiian Skunk delectable mix of pineapple and coconut
Blackberry sweet, tart and bursting with blackberry flavour
Blueberry subtly sweet with a bit of sour, the ideal blueberry flavour
Mentholicious menthol through and through, extra minty
Strawberry- super sweet with a slightly sour strawberry flavour

OCB

Rolling Papers OCB Organic 1 1/4 25 Pack

GP1118

Log in for pricing

Hailing from France, OCB has been producing papers for over 100 years. Today, they are available in 6 continents and are trendsetters in the rolling paper world. OCB Organic papers are made from unbleached, organic hemp. They are a medium-weight paper perfect if what youre rolling is a little on the damp side. As with all OCBs the glue is natural, vegetarian and free of GMOs. Find these papers in a variety of sizes for all your smoking needs.

Infyniti Scales

Scale Infyniti G-Force 100/0.01

FGF100S

Log in for pricing

The G-Force digital scale byInfynitiis small, sleek and perfect for weighing in style. The G-Force has a capacity of 100g and will weigh up to 2 decimal points precisely (0.01g). The instructions are conveniently placed on the inside of the lid, so trouble-shooting and calibration tips are never far away. The digital readout is displayed over a blue backlight and the device has a 60 second auto shutoff. The auto calibration function is a breeze and the three navigational buttons ensure you dont tare your hair out while using the scale. The large stainless steel platform allows for more space for weighing.

RGR Canada Inc.

Filter Tips Elements

GF1002

Log in for pricing

Get more out of your filter tip. Elements perforated rolling tips help you create the perfect filter. Simply use the perforated end to make the center of your tip and wrap the rest of the paper around it or choose the size you want the filter to be by tearing off any number of sections. Element filter tips, like the rest of their products are made without the use of chlorine or chemicals. Each pack contains 50 tips and each box has 50 packs.

Surrender Rolling Tray

H5271

Log in for pricing

Whether youre a connoisseur, beginner or just looking for an affordable, unique tray to keep all your smoking accessories together in one place, this aluminum rolling tray from Famous Design will definitely do the trick.

Keep all your smoking gear within reach with this handy metal rolling tray. Made from quality aluminum it has been designed to be able to take a beating. This delicious rolling tray named Surrender features an epic honey drip design on top of a black background. So, if youre looking for a cool and functional rolling tray you found it!

Juicy Jay

King Size Flavoured Rolling Papers

GPJ1004K

Log in for pricing

Juicy Jays are the most popular flavored rolling papers. With a large variety to choose from and fun images on the paper, they brighten up your smoke sesh.

Juicy Jays are a hemp based paper and use a natural, sugar-based gum. Instead of just flavoring the glue like other brands they have a patented triple dip system giving them a more intense flavor. This adds to the natural essence of your smoke and leaves a tasty tingle on your lips. To make the papers extra cute they are adorned with images of the corresponding flavor, printed in soy based ink .

Each pack of King size papers contains 32 leaves, and each box has 24 packs. Every flavor is unique, try them all to find your favorite.

Ooze

King Palms King Pre-Roll 5pk

GBW131

Log in for pricing

King Palm leaves are made from the Cordia tree. The leaf, corn husk and paper are all biodegradable and sustainable. They are grown without the use of toxic fertilizers and arent artificially flavoured. King Palms are individually handpicked, handmade and cleaned with purified water before being rolled. The leaves burn super slow and hold up to 2 grams per roll. King Palm Pre-Rolls are packaged with a 62% Boveda pack, which is a humidity regulator to help keeps things fresh. Guaranteed fresh for 1 year, King Pre-Rolls are available in a 5pk pouch. Each box contains 15 pouches.

    From the rolling paper experts at Zig-Zag comes Zig-Zag Green Rolling Papers These premium flax papers are 70mm x 38mm and include 32 papers per booklet, with 24 booklets per carton.

    Crafted from the finest blend of natural fibers, these uncompromising papers deliver a slow, even burn. The natural properties of gum Arabic provide a consistent seal without impacting the taste of your smoke. Roll, light, and enjoy a premium smoking experience with Zig-Zag Green.
